data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Kumamoto, Japan.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kumamoto, Japan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Kumamoto, Japan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 10,261 believers in the state of Kumamoto to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kumamoto access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Okinawan, Ryukyuan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Kumamoto, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,812,300 citizens of Kumamoto, Japan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kumamoto, Japan has a population of 1,812,300.

We estimate Kumamoto has 10,261 people who might know Jesus, 28,936 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,773,103 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kumamoto, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Kumamoto
location.people_groups_list: Malay, Toku-No-Shima, Amami-Oshima, Northern, Punjabi, South Asian, Bengali-speaking
